verbs.description: [V: slow] [ARG1: cooker] boeuf bourguignon [ARG0: i] 've wanted to make beef burgundy ever since i got one of julia child cookbooks but i wanted to find a way to fix it in a slow cooker my version of the popular beef stew is still rich hearty and delicious but without the need to watch on the stovetop or in the oven —crystal jo bruns iliff colorado cooker boeuf bourguignon
